main.name: Bruce Molina
main.description: I'm a driven and analytical Bootcamp graduate who is pursuing a backend developer position that allows me to utilize technologies such as Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React to create intuitive, elegant and cutting-edge user experiences
main.bio: I am an accountable and disciplined professional with over five years of experience leading complex projects through their entire life-cycles in the publishing and tech space. I am adept at creating process improvement through work automation and focused leadership. I have combined my program management skills with cutting-edge web development skills that I have curated through an intensive 14-week coding bootcamp. I build web apps because I love the satisfaction of learning and applying viable new skills and challenging my brain through code! I am mainly proficient in Python, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript/React HTML and CSS. I regularly use these as well as other modules/libraries such as MatPlotLib, Pandas and Numpy. In my free time, I enjoy running, attending HIIT classes and stray cat rescue and rehabilitation
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
